body_text:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1306381

Making survey responses available to other features
Filtering based on previous survey responses

Details are negotiatble
Need to consider surveys with changing response options over time


Split into two bugs
body_html:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1306381

  • Making survey responses available to other features
  • Filtering based on previous survey responses
    • Details are negotiatble
    • Need to consider surveys with changing response options over time
  • Split into two bugs
title: Retaining data from previous interactions locally
body:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1306381
- Making survey responses available to other features
- Filtering based on previous survey responses
  - Details are negotiatble
  - Need to consider surveys with changing response options over time
- Split into two bugs
